statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_performance_reviews ORDER BY evaluation_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM feedback_performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback_performance_reviews WHERE evaluation_score >= 4.5 ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM feedback_performance_reviews WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(evaluation_score) AS average_score FROM feedback_performance_reviews;
SELECT * FROM feedback_performance_reviews WHERE evaluation_score > 4 ORDER BY employee_id DESC, evaluation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(evaluation_score) AS avg_score FROM feedback_performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_score > 3.5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM feedback_performance_reviews WHERE comments IS NOT NULL AND improvement_plans IS NOT NULL ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS total_evaluations FROM feedback_performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_evaluations DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, MAX(evaluation_score) AS top_score FROM feedback_performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY top_score DESC, employee_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM evaluations WHERE score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, evaluator_id, feedback FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM improvement_plans WHERE plan_status = 'Pending';
SELECT plan_id, employee_id, plan_description, plan_deadline FROM improvement_plans ORDER BY plan_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluations WHERE score > 90;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, score FROM evaluations ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluator_id, evaluation_date FROM evaluations WHERE score < 60;
SELECT * FROM evaluations WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT e.employee_id, i.plan_description FROM evaluations e JOIN improvement_plans i ON e.employee_id = i.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter_id = 1001;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE evaluation_id = 500 ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT(employee_id) FROM improvement_plans;
SELECT * FROM evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_score FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_score FROM evaluations WHERE employee_id = 123 AND evaluation_score < 60;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE comment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND comment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT commenter_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY commenter_id;
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM evaluations;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter_id = 123;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_department FROM employees WHERE employee_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, employee_location FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR' AND employee_location = 'New York';

SELECT employees.employee_name, evaluations.evaluation_score, comments.comment_text FROM employees JOIN evaluations ON employees.employee_id = evaluations.employee_id JOIN comments ON evaluations.evaluation_id = comments.evaluation_id;

SELECT employee_name, evaluation_date, plan_description FROM employees JOIN evaluations ON employees.employee_id = evaluations.employee_id JOIN improvement_plans ON evaluations.evaluation_id = improvement_plans.evaluation_id WHERE improvement_plans.plan_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id, team_size FROM teams WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, feedback FROM evaluations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT comment_text, timestamp FROM comments WHERE commenter_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, rating FROM evaluations WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.name, e.position, t.team_name FROM employees e JOIN teams t ON e.employee_id = t.team_lead_id;
SELECT e.name, e.position, p.plan_description FROM employees e JOIN improvement_plans p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
